Event: Having dark moments in life, realizing the need for help, accepting that help, and feeling a sense of not belonging when surrounded by people.

"I'm having a tough time right now and it feels like everything is falling apart. I know I need help, but I'm afraid to ask for it because I don't want to burden anyone. I just feel so lost and alone, even when I'm surrounded by people."

This post exhibits a global attributional style because it takes a negative experience (having dark moments) and generalizes it to the individual's whole life (feeling like everything is falling apart). It also attributes the cause of the event to the individual's own shortcomings (afraid to ask for help, feeling lost and alone), rather than external factors.
